title: Modify StackOfIntegers class
description:
class StackOfIntegers
{
public:
  StackOfIntegers();
  bool empty();
  int peek();
  void push(int value);
  int pop();
  int getSize();
};
Define a custom exception class named EmptyStackException and let the peek and pop function throw an ExmptyStackException if the stack is empty.
The test function f():
void f()
{
  StackOfIntegers s;

  try
  {
    s.peek();
  }
  catch(EmptyStackException ex)
  {
    cout << ex.what() << endl;
  }
 
  try
  {
    s.pop();
  }
  catch(EmptyStackException ex)
  {
    cout << ex.what() << endl;
  }
}
should output:
Empty Stack Exception
Empty Stack Exception
